events.message: The insured driver reported an auto accident involving their vehicle colliding with a tree on the 30th of April.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial details and damage description.
An insurance agent was assigned to manage and follow up on this auto accident claim promptly.
Acknowledgement of receipt of the auto accident claim was sent to the insured customer.
Requested police report, vehicle photos, and driver’s statement to proceed with the investigation.
Received all requested documents including police report and photos of the damaged vehicle parts.
Initiated claim investigation to verify circumstances and assess the extent of the vehicle damage.
Completed vehicle inspection and confirmed claim validity with no conflicting information found.
Proposed a fair settlement amount based on repair estimates and coverage limits.
Received positive feedback from customer appreciating timely communication and fair settlement offer.
Insurance claim was formally approved following acceptance of the settlement terms by the insured.
Payment for the approved settlement amount was issued directly to the insured's bank account.
The claim was officially closed after payment and all procedures were completed successfully.
Archived the completed claim documents and records into the company’s long-term storage system.
